title: Five features iPhone users can test now in the iOS 17 public beta
description: Apple's latest iPhone software update, iOS 17, is now available as a public beta for anyone brave enough to test it. Here are five notable changes to check out.

title: Elon Musk forms new AI company, with researchers from Google, OpenAI
description: Elon Musk unveiled a team of eleven employees, drawn from OpenAI, DeepMind and the University of Toronto, a center of academic AI research, to form xAI.

title: Printer ink is a scam. Here’s how to spend less.
description: Americans waste $10 billion each year on name-brand ink. So we tested low-cost options including remanufactured cartridges, ink injection kits — and even making our own.
